name: Joy Life 2
description:
Game introduction

Although being sick and hospitalized is not something worth celebrating, as the most involved employee in the company, due to the accumulation of long overtime work, he was finally overwhelmed and fell ill... but he gave himself a short vacation.
The company hired a nurse to take care of your daily life for you, and she left a deep impression on you the first time you met her.
Her name is Ao Wei
She has red hair, tattoos, and is a beautiful woman. She has a gentle and considerate personality, but... she always makes strange noises in the middle of the night, and you dare not say a word while lying on the hospital bed...
With doubts, you quietly follow her to the cubicle tonight to find out...

Gameplay

Joy Life 2 is the same as the previous game, still a casual card flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. When all the cards in the picture are eliminated and you enter the next level, you can Unlock Ovie’s hidden secrets…
